idea:
EUCIT Systems Pvt. Ltd. headquartered in Mumbai with PAN India support. EUCIT Systems has a wide portfolio in END User Computing Solutions & Services.


The company name is an acronym of "End User Computing with Intelligence". Enabling Business Transformation through Green IT Solutions.


Our Objective “To engage in the business of providing sales and services for all kinds of technology products both hardware and software products including consultancy services by various modes and with the use of IT and its applications.


EUCIT is the leading independent provider of flexible and innovative hardware and software maintenance service provider. EUCIT focus is on the data center client with complete solutions for major OEM hardware suppliers. EUCIT delivers customized and flexible services to the public sector, manufacturing, high-tech, aerospace, telecom and banking/finance and chemical/pharmaceutical sectors, with many of each industry’s largest and most respected brands as current clients.


EUCIT core competencies are only the beginning. We take flexibility very seriously, and tailor our programs to meet your needs, whether you need 7x24x365 support, help desk only, active network monitoring, automated diagnostics and ticket-opening, or a completely reactive system–or anything in between. You choose the SLA you require and we can present you with a number of options to achieve it within your service and budget restraints. Most importantly, we develop a clear transition plan from the beginning to ensure that your change in support service providers happens smoothly with minimal impact, if any, on your daily operations, uptime, or the productivity of your teams.
name: EUCIT Systems Private Limited

idea:
Myself Sumeet Salvi, Age 40 years living in Dombivli with my family - Mother(A retired Govt. Servant worked as Sister In Charge in J.J. Group Of Hospitals), My wife (Housewife), Son & Daughter.


I was formerly working as Senior Tech Executive and latter entered in business. No doubt i love to travel a lot and may be this is the reason I had a thought to enter in Hotel & Resorts Business..


Now a days where all world had seen and went through the epic panademic of Covid 19 since last 2 years, many businesses started up where many ended due to crisis. 


This idea took place in my mind when my close friend came to me to discuss that what he can do with his own piece of land situated at Shahapur, Murbad, Maharashtra. And then i involved myself to find a best thing can be build up which can give maximum returns against the investment.


A most popular destination for all world to travel is Bali.. which is famous for its unimaginable beauty and unique bamboo resorts.. After a lot of research decided to build a unique bamboo resort on his land and start a Balinese themed hotel and resort ( completely made of bamboos - including all furniture, each and every thing).


After a thorough calculation its costing around 50 lakhs ( a rough calculation which will not exceed but definitely will be less, just keeping this figure for an appx calculation) This cost includes - Firm Registration, Finance Agreement, Property Lease Agreement, 2 Unique Bamboo Villas with personal swimming pools, 10+ Bamboo Cottages, Common Swimming Pool, Landscaping and plantations, Property fencing, advertising, Sales and management.


By keeping in mind minimum appx monthly income around 2 -3 lakhs without any risk investment in this can be returned withing 2 years.


So here I am looking for seed funding for my idea of Balinese themed Hotel & resort and looking forward to get positive response.
name: Five Elements Hotels & Resorts

idea:
Vyapardost is a B2B marketplace with AI Negotiation.

The fastest way to complete your B2B purchases & contracts.


The current B2B Processes are slow, costly & incomplete.

If you want to buy construction bricks.

You have to go through all of this:

1. Find Sellers on B2B Marketplaces like IndiaMart

2. Send Enquiry to these sellers via email

3. Follow up for Quotes by manual calling

4. Negotiate with each seller separately through meetings

5. Compare Quotes in Excel

6. Manage PO in ERP software

Vyapardost provides End to End Solutions for B2B purchases & can reduce the deal time from weeks to up to 30 minutes with AI Smart Negotiation & can save up to 20% of Purchase cost.

Vyapardost makes B2B purchase fast, economic, transparent and always at the best price.

 

Leading Construction Companies Like Sunanda, Choksey, Kamdhenu Ply, Depa Indi and Raina Industries have already registered on VyaparDost.

 

Checkout our website at www.vyapardost.com
name: VYAPARDOST PRIVATE LIMITED
